entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
